content.description:
Superduper traverses a solid face on an excellent assortment of holds.

Stand start (a sit start is possible but doesn't add much value, IMO) with right and left hand edges. From there, traverse left through a pair of oblique rails, eventually reach a left hand gaston, crank to a right hand two-finger pocket, gain the left hand sidepull, stand up to a two-finger pocket pinch - an incredible hold, and finish straight up using the same finish as

How Much A Dollar Cost

.
content.protection: A pair of pads worked well. There is a tree behind the problem for a portion, and rock sits behind the finish, but both don't really play a role unless you blow off a hold.
content.location: It traverses from right to left on Superduper's north face.

content.description: Sit start with hands matched on the oblique feature. From there, work up and right using the sidepulls and features on the face to reach a featured top.
content.protection: A pair of pads will work fine. The immediate landing is great, there is a nasty rock behind the problem, but it shouldn't be much of an issue.
content.location: It climbs the center feature of Superduper's north face.

content.description: Squat start with hands matched on the jug at the seam's base. From there, follow the seam up and right, and mantle atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pad and a spot ideally. The immediate landing is very good, but there is a tree behind where the problem climbs.
content.location: It climbs the west seam on Superduper's north face.

content.description:
Sit start with a left hand crimp and a right hand edge. From there, pull to an edge, continue up the face using a plethora of holds, reach the lip, and top it out.

The first move gives the problem its grade, the remainder is a stroll on good edges.

Much of the patina is thin and friable, but it will clean up nicely with more traffic.
content.protection: A pad and a spot ideally. The immediate landing good, but there is a tree behind the problem.
content.location: It climbs the western section of Superduper's north face.
